body_html:
Hi Rasmus and Tatiana,
Thank you very much for the code review and valuable suggestions for code refinement.
I am preparing for 4 new PRs related to MKL primitive reuse (conv2d, relu, batchnorm and pooling),
for which I have done refactoring based on Rasmus's suggestions on first primitive reuse PR (conv fwd). I look forward to working with you soon. Regards! Guozhong (gzmkl).

body:
Hi Rasmus and Tatiana, 
Thank you very much for the code review and valuable suggestions for code refinement. 
I am preparing for 4 new PRs related to MKL primitive reuse (conv2d, relu, batchnorm and pooling),
for which I have done refactoring  based on Rasmus's suggestions on first primitive reuse PR (conv fwd). I look forward to working with you soon.  Regards!   Guozhong (gzmkl).
